item.title: chattr
item.description: A friend reminded me about chattr. Linux ext{2,3,4} filesystems have supplementary file attributes which can be modified with the “change attributes” utility found in the e2fsprogs package. The two most interesting in my opinion are +/- i for immutable and +/- j for secure deletion: $ sudo chattr +i /bin/ps $ sudo chattr +j secret.txt $ lsattr bar ----i----j---e- bar
